column1: Smoque BBQ////I like to consider myself as a BBQ snob being I'm from Missouri which is very near to some of the best BBQ. I always judge places based on their brisket bc you either do it well and it's not worth eating...... Well let me tell you the brisket was not a disappointment.... I loved every bit of it from the burnt ends to the perfectly smoked taste. The cornbread was pretty decent but the coleslaw was not
column2: in my opinion good at all. If you're going through Chicago and want BBQ go here!!
